Instruction: Peel the sweet potatoes and cut them into cubes.
In a pot of boiling water, cook the sweet potato cubes until tender, about 15-20 minutes.
Drain the cooked sweet potatoes and return them to the pot.
Add butter, milk, brown sugar, salt,  and cinnamon to the pot.
Mash the sweet potatoes using a potato masher until smooth and creamy.
Serve hot as a comforting side dish.
